channel.title: pylibmc on Fatkun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in pylibmc on Fatkun's Blog

item.title: 安装pylibmc
item.description: 首先需要安装libmemcached ，不要安装太新的版本，对gcc有要求 http://launchpad.net/libmemcached/1.0/0.51/+download/libmemcached-0.51.tar.gz 然后就可以安装了， ./configuare make && sudo make install 之后用pip安装pylibmc， https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pylibmc pip
